ygData.subject: re: Re: Monk Loot and Modifications (was Re: An idea for the slow day)
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, it s so great in Asheron s Call, everyone does look different.  Maybe they will include new graphics in the expansion set?
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, it's so great in Asheron's Call, everyone does look different. Maybe they will
include new graphics in the expansion set?


>
> For enhanced graphics, I think there should be an optional download...
> maybe some people would want to download a 300 MB file. I know i would
> want to. Im tired of everyone looking the same anyhow. I hear that in
> Asheron's Call everyone looks much different from each other than they do in
> EQ. Maybe the next EQ addon will address this (if there is one, more $ for
> Verant).
>
> Sleet
> Brell Serilis
>
